reference.title: euscale-put-scaling-policy
reference.shortdesc: Creates or updates a scaling policy.

section.title: Syntax
section.codeblock: euscale-put-scaling-policy PolicyName -g, --auto-scaling-group value [--adjustment value] [-t, --adjustment-type value] [--cooldown value] [-s, --min-adjustment-step value]

row.entry: The name of the auto scaling group associated with the policy.
The amount to scale the capacity of the group. Use a negative number to decrease capacity.

Indicates the type of change for the --adjustment parameter. Valid values are:
ChangeInCapacity A fixed-number increment of the old value
ExactCapacity An absolute value
PercentChangeInCapacity A percentage of the current capacity
The waiting period, in seconds, before auto scaling activities will resume.
The minimum adjustment value for PercentageChangeInCapacity-type adjustments.
